Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the SunHome skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your smart light devices by voice. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your SunHome account and discover your devices. 
When using the skill, you need established names for your devices. You can use the SunHome app to set up the device name.Once you know the name for your devices, you can say the following:
"Alexa, turn on floor lamp"
"Alexa,set floor lamp to 50%”
How to use “SunHome” Mobile Applicaiton
1、Install “SunHome” from App Store
2、Register your account and login 
3、Click the “+” symbol
4、Choose the device model
5、Setup the device wifi 
6、Change the device name
7、then , you can control your device by mobile Application

If you have any questions, please visit the SunHome app manual http://www.huihetech.cn/ifuturehome/iFutureHome_User_Guide.pdf
